Text:
NoSoup4U: Thank you very much for this awesomeness. 

To everyone else: Downloaded and checked the .epub, good release and definitely alot better styling than the other version floating around. Chapter 20 has no broken scanning and TOC is working.

Arinohyoshi,
You are welcome. Glad to help out.
thank you, NoSoup4U. i just finished book 13 and don't have the money for the hardcover. you, my friend, are a hero whose legend will last for ages :)
